00014 /* $Id: dfgr.h 4932 2007-09-07 17:17:23Z bmribler $ */

00016 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017  * File:    dfgr.h
00018  * Purpose: header file for the Raster Image set
00019  * Invokes: df.h
00020  * Contents:
00021  *  Structure definitions: DFGRdr, DFGRrig
00022  * Remarks: This is included with user programs which use general raster
00023  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00024 
00025 #ifndef DFGR_H  /* avoid re-inclusion */
00026 #define DFGR_H
00027 
00028 /* description record: used to describe image data, palette data etc. */
00029 typedef struct
00030   {
00031       intn        ncomponents;  /* number of components */
00032       intn        interlace;    /* data ordering: chunky / planar etc */
00033       int32       xdim;         /* X- dimension of data */
00034       int32       ydim;         /* Y- dimensionsof data */
00035       DFdi        nt;           /* number type of data */
00036       DFdi        compr;        /* compression */
00037       /* ### Note: compression is currently uniquely described with a tag.
00038          No data is attached to this tag/ref.  But this capability is
00039          provided for future expansion, when this tag/ref might point to
00040          some data needed for decompression, such as the actual encodings */
00041   }
00042 DFGRdr;
00043 
00044 /* structure to hold RIG info */
00045 typedef struct
00046   {
00047       char       *cf;           /* color format */
00048       int32       xpos;         /* X position of image on screen */
00049       int32       ypos;         /* Y position of image on screen */
00050       float32     aspectratio;  /* ratio of pixel height to width */
00051       float32     ccngamma;     /* gamma color correction parameter */
00052       float32     ccnred[3];    /* red color correction parameter */
00053       float32     ccngrren[3];  /* green color correction parameter */
00054       float32     ccnblue[3];   /* blue color correction parameter */
00055       float32     ccnwhite[3];  /* white color correction parameter */
00056       DFdi        data[3];      /* image/lut/mattechannel */
00057       DFGRdr      datadesc[3];  /* description of image/lut/mattechannel */
00058   }
00059 DFGRrig;
00060 
00061 #if defined c_plusplus || defined __cplusplus
00062 extern      "C"
00063 {
00064 #endif                          /* c_plusplus || __cplusplus */
00065 
00066 /* Library-developer functions */
00067     extern int32 DFGRIopen
00068                 (const char *filename, int acc_mode);
00069 
00070 #if defined c_plusplus || defined __cplusplus
00071 }
00072 #endif                          /* c_plusplus || __cplusplus */
00073 
00074 #endif                          /* DFGR_H */
